/usr/bin/c++    -std=c++11 -O3   CMakeFiles/icp.dir/icp.cpp.o  -o icp -rdynamic /home/lsw/slambook/3rdparty/Sophus/bulid/libSophus.so /usr/local/lib/libpangolin.so -lg2o_core -lg2o_stuff -lg2o_types_sba -lg2o_csparse_extension -lcxsparse -lGLU -lGL -lGLEW -lX11 -lpython2.7 -lavcodec -lavformat -lavutil -lswscale -lOpenNI -lpng -lz -ljpeg -ltiff -Wl,-rpath,/home/lsw/slambook/3rdparty/Sophus/bulid:/usr/local/lib
